text.text: Developers: Nicola Salmoria and the MAME Team

text.name: info5
text.text: M.A.M.E is an emulator application designed to recreate

text.name: info6
text.text: the hardware of arcade game systems in software

text.name: info7
text.text: on modern personal computers and other platforms.

text.name: info8
text.text: The intention is to preserve gaming history by preventing

text.name: info9
text.text: vintage games from being lost or forgotten.
